stimulusHtml: The diagrams above use arrows to represent the speed of a gas particle. Which of the diagrams best represents the speed of the particles of a gas at a fixed temperature, and why?
choicesHtml: Diagram 1, because all the particles have the same speed.
Diagram 1, because the particles are moving in different directions.
Diagram 2, because the particles have a net kinetic energy of zero.
Diagram 2, because the particles have a variety of different speeds.
